name: Infested & Sons Inc. LLC. Ltd.
description:
Welcome, new employee, to Infested & Sons! We need YOU to clean up our offices! Be warned, the offices change sometimes! You'll watch through the cameras while controlling the SmackBot 23™️ to exterminate all of the pests!

Sincerely, HR

Epilepsy warning! There are fast-changing sprites!

Made for GMKO 2023 Round 1.
